name: Unlysccenced Fharmacist
description:
Created for Chillenium 2022 by: Dallas Coggins, Casey Pei, Peter Schlenker, and Madison Sutton.

You're an unlicensed pharmacist running a potion Apothecary. Mix the correct potions for your customers in a timely manner.   What will the fate of you shop be?

Hint: Wolfsbane is a great starting ingredient.
